Line3.EDCC9: Now they were like ravenous animals… hungry for flesh. Hot, steaming flesh, consumed straight from the bones of the still living! We fled, but I can feel them in pursuit. Hungry for more…
Line1.EDCC9: We were prepared to face demons, fortified against the denizens of Hell itself. What we found was infinitely more horrifying. The creatures we encountered… I assume they were human at one time… but now…
